# The `IntrusiveRefCntPtr` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A smart pointer to a reference-counted object that inherits from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/refcountedbase">RefCountedBase</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadsaferefcountedbase">ThreadSafeRefCountedBase</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A smart pointer to a reference-counted object that inherits from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/refcountedbase">RefCountedBase</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadsaferefcountedbase">ThreadSafeRefCountedBase</a>.

This class increments its pointee&#39;s reference count when it is created, and decrements its refcount when it&#39;s destroyed (or is changed to point to a different object).

Definition at line 173 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/intrusiverefcntptr-h">IntrusiveRefCntPtr.h</a>.
